channel.title: 718 command request [::mypos]
channel.description: Hey guys, the title describes this post. the source I downloaded did not come with a ::mypos command and I'm not to familiar with coding 508+ servers so I was wondering if anyone has the code to a ::mypos command giving the X, Y, position. Thanks!

item.title: 718 command request [::mypos]
item.dc:creator: @FromAutumnToAshes FromAutumnToAshes
item.description:
@FromAutumnToAshes wrote:

Thanks man, appreciate it!

item.title: 718 command request [::mypos]
item.dc:creator: @serversdownload serversdownload
item.description:
@serversdownload wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
			c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX+" Y: "+c.absY+" H: "+c.heightLevel);
		}

[/code]

Read full topic
